The Skinburster was an enchanted halberd that allowed the wielder to accumulate force energy, created sometime before the late 15 century DR.
The Skinbursters enchantments made the weapon emit a gentle yellow light in which its curved blade resembled an unnerving smile. The weapon also possessed a simple +1 enchantment that made its blade more deadly, and it guided the wielders aim towards the target. Lastly, the weapons skinburster force magic imbued the wielder with a charge of magical force energy upon a successful strike, making them a force conduit for twelve seconds. By itself, this enchantment had little utility but could be synergized with other magic items that allowed for the release of the accumulated force.
